name: Joe's Godot Tutorial Learning
description:
This is nothing special. I learned with help form the HeartBeast YT tutorial

Controls are arrow keys.

Up = Jump/Open Door

Left = Move Left

Right = Move Right

Click "Start Game" to go to start the game. 

Thanks for checking this game out everybody!

Source code is here: https://github.com/soptheturtle/godot_learning/tree/main/Tutorial_002

The HeartBeast Tutorial I learned from is here:
